alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bryan; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Inland Liberty; Inland McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, LIBERTY AND MCINTOSH COUNTIES... At 500 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over South Newport, or 14 miles east of Tibet, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...excessive cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...All outdoor activities should cease. Move indoors immediately. Some locations in the path of this storm include... South Newport, Halfmoon Landing, Harris Neck, Shellman Bluff, St. Catherines Island and Pine Harbor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<45 MPH
info.instruction: Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 15 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bryan; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Inland Liberty; Inland McIntosh
